Author: windhunters
Title: ★★★[ANN][PRE-ICO] ►PREVISIONe - Professional Prediction Platform◄
Body: You say it's first prediction platform.  What is a difference from STOX or Cindicator?

Author: cryptofit
Title: ★★★[ANN][PRE-ICO] ►PREVISIONe - Professional Prediction Platform◄
Body: On STOX, predictions are based on the principle of "crowd prediction", thats mean, if most people vote for an event that will come true, it will happen. On PREVISIONe platform, predictions about events which are interesting for a group are given by predictors with the ability to make forecasts in special area and specific knowledge in this area.  In addition to financial and sports forecasts, our platform offers predictions about business, career, relationships etc. Users can choose their predictor based on their accuracy indicators.  Predictions for groups queries, for example the result of a sports events, make several predictors simultaneously. For personal issues, you can communicate with the predictor personally.

Author: cryptofit
Title: ★★★[ANN][PRE-ICO] ►PREVISIONe - Professional Prediction Platform◄
Body: If Your question about Group Request service... Just high ranking predictors can participate in the Group Request. The quantity of them does not limit. For example, if You wanna know the winner of uefa 2018 - You are making order for Group Request about this event. Any users could join to the request (f.e. 500 users). The request will be available for all predictors with high rank in this area (sport events). And they could make prediction for the uefa 2018 event. The result will available just for users who are participant of the event. They could use prediction for betting

Author: cattano
Title: ★★★[ANN][PRE-ICO] ►PREVISIONe - Professional Prediction Platform◄
Body: The project says that this prediction will be accurate, So what happened if the prediction were happened to be wrong? Will there any compensation for it?

Author: AdvRate
Title: ★★★[ANN][PRE-ICO] ►PREVISIONe - Professional Prediction Platform◄
Body: In this case, compensation is not provided. PREVISIONe help find right choice, but You are responsible make it or not. If this prediction is private, you can choose predictors based on the statistics of previous predictions. In case, Free Question service, You will ask question for several predictors - and then You will choose more interesting predictor for YOU to continue dialogue with him. After prediction period You will evaluate the predictors accuracy for many options - You will get rewards for this too. In case of Group Question Service, for example results of football match, PREVISIONe choose special football predictors and provide results for users. After game PREVISIONe reCalculate data of accuracy every predictor.
